metadata.dc:author: Guadalajara, J F
Manero, L S
metadata.dc:description: The method for visualizing the left cavities of the heart by means of levophase of pulmonary angiography is described. Its indications and advantages, and the simplicity of the technique are described, and the low risk this procedure places on the patient are emphasized.
metadata.dc:title: El estudio de las cavidades izquierdas del corazón mediante la levofase de la angiografía pulmonar. Estudio preliminar
[Radiography of the left cavities of the heart using the levophase of pulmonary angiography. Preliminary study].
metadata.dc:publisher: Archivos del Instituto de Cardiologia de Mexico
